subject: Re: xorg server error on init
body:
On Thursday 19 April 2007 03:53, Paolo wrote:
> On Wed, Apr 18, 2007 at 04:38:47PM -0300, Nicolas Garimaldi wrote:
> > but im using debian and y try to upgrade my navigator, and the
> > aptitude upgrade me ALL the system . . .  so i dont think this will
>
> you have some lines in your /etc/apt/sources.list pointing to 'stable'
> instead of 'sarge' - on 08/04 stable=etch and ... boom!
>
> > i have a old compaq presario
> > and a kernel 2.6.8
> > debian sarge or debian version 4.0
>
> either you get back to sarge, or go on upgrading to etch, in which case
> you need to move on to a more recent kernel too - ie 2.6.18-*
>
> --
> paolo

I got the same problem, but I finishing all update and upgrade until no 
conflict dependencies, then run dexconf, It works. and the I load the kernel 
module for all hardware driver. but I got new problem.
How to set LC_ALL=

sandi


--
